rtega_mnemonic:
徑徑RS
径径		narrow path, diameter, direct
  • underground streams 坙 go 彳 through narrow paths
  • ⓢ walking 彳 a narrow path through the planted fields 圣: going off the path will destroy crops; it is mostly a straight path leading you directly to the other side

jìng: (сущ) путь, тропа, дорога; хороший способ; (сокр.) диаметр
jìng: (нареч) прямо, напрямик
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The file of soldiers have a long trail ahead of them and need extra toilet paper for the journey.
humanum_full_description_en:
From "彳", "巠" sound. The original meaning is a walking path. "Said Wen": "Roads, trails. From 彳, 巠声." Duan Yucai's note: "This cloud trail means that people, cows and horses can walk on foot, but not cars." Such as "The Analects. "Yong Ye": "Those who have Tantai and exterminate Ming can't help it." "Zhou Li. Local official Situ. "Suiren": "Where to rule Nofield, there is a sui between the husband, and then there is a path." Zheng Xuan's note: "The path accommodates cattle and horses."

" Path " refers to the road in general. Such as "The Songs of the Chu. "Calling the Soul": "Gaolan is gradually being followed by the road." Wang Yi's note: "The path, the road." "Warring States. "Eastern Zhou Policy": "The widow will send the path to Chu."

" Path " means to take a small path or a shortcut. "Guang Ya. Interpretation of the Second ": "The path, but also." Such as "Historical Records. "Benji of the Gaozu": "The Gaozu was drunk, and the night is in the middle of the road." Sima Zhensuo Yin: "Speaking of letting go after drinking, the night is going in the middle of the world, dare not follow the right path, and thus seek illness." It can also be compared to improper. Doorway or side door left. "Lao Tzu. Chapter Fifty-Three: "The great road is very barbarian, but the people are good paths." Heshang Gong's note: "Barbarian, the people are easy. Paths, evil and not fair. The roads are very easy, and the people are good from evil paths."

" Path " means to walk and pass. Such as "Lu's Spring and Autumn. "Zhao Lei": "Xijia's scribbles, go to the palace without stopping." "Huainanzi. "Human World": "Qin Niu was robbed in the mountains due to lack of a trail. He seized the horses and wagons, untied his chariots, dragged his clothes and quilts.

" Diameter " is also a mathematical term that means diameter. Such as "Nine Chapters Arithmetic. "Juku": "Today there are eight steps in a sentence, 15 steps in a strand. What is the circle in the question? What is the diameter?" "Hou Han Shu. "The Biography of Zhang Heng": "In the first year of Yangjia, the wind and geodynamic instrument was rebuilt. It is made of fine copper, with a round diameter of eight feet, and a raised cover. It looks like a wine statue and is decorated in the shape of a mountain turtle, bird and beast in seal script."

" Path " can be used as an adverb to mean always and directly. Such as "Xunzi. "Evil of Nature": "Speaking less, you will be simple and simple, and the law will be discussed. If you lose it with a rope, it is the knowledge of the gentleman." It also means that it is just. Such as "Historical Records. Comical Biography: "The shawl bows down in fear and drinks, but he gets drunk after a fight."
humanum_short_description_en: From "彳", "巠" sound. The original meaning is a walking path.
humanum_full_description:
從「彳」，「巠」聲。本義是步行的小路。《說文》：「徑，步道也。从彳，巠聲。」段玉裁注：「此云步道，謂人及牛馬可步行而不容車也。」如《論語．雍也》：「有澹臺滅明者，行不由徑。」《周禮．地官司徒．遂人》：「凡治野田，夫間有遂，遂上有徑。」鄭玄注：「徑容牛馬。」

　　「徑」後泛指道路。如《楚辭．招魂》：「皋蘭被徑兮斯路漸。」王逸注：「徑，路也。」《戰國策．東周策》：「寡人將寄徑於楚。」「寄徑」即借道。

　　「徑」表示走小路、走近路。《廣雅．釋詁二》：「徑，衺也。」如《史記．高祖本紀》：「高祖被酒，夜徑澤中。」司馬貞索隱：「言酒後放徒，夜徑行澤中，不敢由正路，且從而求疾也。」又可比喻不正當的門路或旁門左道。《老子．五十三章》：「大道甚夷，而民好徑。」河上公注：「夷，平易也。徑，邪不平正也。大道甚平易，而民好從邪徑也。」

　　「徑」表示走過、經過。如《呂氏春秋．召類》：「西家之潦，徑其宮而不止。」《淮南子．人間》：「秦牛缺徑於山中而遇盜，奪之車馬，解其橐笥，拖其衣被。」

　　「徑」也是數學名詞，表示直徑。如《九章算術．句股》：「今有句八步，股一十五步。問句中容圓，徑幾何？」《後漢書．張衡列傳》：「陽嘉元年，復造候風地動儀。以精銅鑄成，圓徑八尺，合蓋隆起，形似酒尊，飾以篆文山龜鳥獸之形。」

　　「徑」可作副詞，表示一直、直接。如《荀子．性惡》：「少言則徑而省、論而法，若佚之以繩，是士君子之知也。」又表示即、就。如《史記．滑稽列傳》：「髡恐懼俯伏而飲，不過一斗徑醉矣。」
humanum_short_description: 從「彳」，「巠」聲。本義是步行的小路。

Chinese: The queue for toilet paper looks like a long trail and after a while starts to circle back around like a spool.
Meaning: trail

Story: The file of soldiers have a long trail ahead of them and need extra toilet paper for the journey.
Kind: traditional

徑字的基本解释

徑
jìng
见“径”。

徑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jìng］
［《廣韻》古定切，去徑，見。］
“径1”的繁体字。亦作“陘2”。
(1)步道；小路。
(2)泛指道路。
(3)比喻能达到某种目的的不正当门路。
(4)泛指从业行事的途径。
(5)直径。
(6)捷速。
(7)直接；一直。
(8)即；就。
[②]［jīng］
［《集韻》堅靈切，平青，見。］
“径2”的繁体字。
(1)经过；行经。
(2)南北为径。参见“徑2輪”。

徑字的康熙字典解释

【寅集下】【彳字部】　徑； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页367第19
【集韻】古定切【韻會】【正韻】吉定切，?音徑。【說文】步道也。【徐鍇曰】道不容車，故曰步道。【玉篇】小路也。【易·說卦傳】艮爲山，爲徑路。【疏】徯徑，細小狹路。【周禮·地官·遂人】夫閒有遂，遂上有徑。【註】徑容牛馬。【疏】徑不容車軌，而容牛馬及人之步徑。【禮·月令】審端徑術。【三輔決錄】蔣詡舍中三徑，唯羊仲求仲從之游。　又【廣雅】徑，袤也。【禮·曲禮】送喪不由徑。【註】徑，邪路也。　又疾也，直也。【史記·大宛傳】張騫曰：今使大夏，從羌中險，從蜀宜徑。【註】如淳曰：徑，疾也。【唐書·盧藏用傳】仕宦之捷徑。　又直波也。【爾雅·釋水】直波爲徑。【註】言徑涏。　又【集韻】徑，直也。【禮·檀弓】有直情而徑行者。　又猶行也。【左傳·僖二十五年】晉趙衰以壺飱從徑，餒而弗食。　又【集韻】堅靈切，音經。行過也。【史記·高祖紀】高祖被酒，夜徑澤中。　又【韻會】通作俓。【史記·司馬相如傳】俓峻赴險。　又與竟通。【史記·淳于髡傳】不過一斗，徑醉矣。

徑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
徑字的起名意思

暂无。

path
Basic explanation of words
path
jìng
See "path".
path
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jìng］
["Guangyun" ancient fixed cut, go to the path, see. ]
Traditional characters for "径1". Also known as "Xing 2".
(1) Trails; trails.
(2) Refers to the road in general.
(3) It is a metaphor for an improper way to achieve a certain purpose.
(4) Generally refers to the way of doing business.
(5) Diameter.
(6) Fast speed.
(7) Direct; always.
(8) That is; just.
[②]［jīng］
["Jiyun" is solid and sharp, flat and green, see you. ]
The traditional characters of "径2".
(1) Passing; passing through.
(2) The north-south is the path. See "diameter 2 rounds".
path
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 2] [彳字部] 　 Jing; Kangxi strokes: 10; Page number: Page 367 Page 19
[Jiyun] Ancient Dingqie [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Ji Dingqie, sound path. [Said Wen] Trails too. [Xu Kai said] Roads cannot accommodate cars, so they are called trails. [Jade articles] Small roads too. 【Easy·Said Gua Chuan】Gen is a mountain and a path. 【Sparse】A narrow and narrow path. 【Zhou Li·Diguan·Suiren】The husband has a good time, and then there is a way to go. [Note] Diameter capacity cattle and horses. 【Sparse】The path does not allow cars or tracks, but a footpath for cattle, horses and people. 【Ritual·Monthly Order】Examination of Duan Jingshu. 【Sanfu Julu】Jiang Xushe's three paths in the middle, and only the sheep seeks the middle of the journey.　[Guang Ya] The path, the vastness. 【Rituals·Music Gifts】The funeral can't be given away. [Note] Path, evil road also.　I'm sick again, I'm straight. 【Historical Records·Dawan Biography】Zhang Qian said: Today, Daxia will be dangerous from Qiang, and from Shu to path. [Note] Ru Chun said: Path, disease also. [Tang Shu·Lu Zang Yong Biography] Shortcut to official officials.　 Naobo again. 【Erya·Shishui】Straight waves are the path. [Note] Words are swayed.　【Jiyun】Go straight and straight. [Li·Tan Gong] A person who is straightforward and walks away.　It still works. [Zuo Zhuan·Xi Twenty-five Years] Jin and Zhao failed to follow the path with a pot, discouraged and eaten.　[Jiyun] Hard and Spiritual, Sound Classics. I have also been. [Historical Records · Gao Zu Ji] Gao Zu was drunk, and the night was in the middle of the road.　[Rhyme Club] is a pass. [Historical Records · Sima Xiangru Biography] Qi Jun went into danger.　And Jingtong again. [Historical Records·Chun Yu's Biography] It's just a fight, and I'm drunk.
